document.full_text: sales of cameraphones will grow to more than 1 billion handsets this year, helped by fast growth at the high end of the market, research firm strategy analytics said on thursday.
document.title: cameraphone sales seen topping 1 billion in 2011
lines_and_colors: sales of cameraphones will grow to more than 1 billion handsets this year, helped by fast growth at the high end of the market, research firm strategy analytics said on thursday.
